summary: Completed frontend testing of FieldOS UI enhancements. Fixed critical compilation error (missing dispatchAPI). Most features working well including leads modal, dispatch board stats, and settings verification. Session management issues caused some test interruptions.

ui_bugs.issue: Frequent automatic logouts interrupting user sessions
Monthly calendar view not loading properly - grid layout not found

integration_issues.issue: Some navigation timeouts due to session management issues

passed_tests: Frontend compilation - Fixed missing dispatchAPI import in /app/frontend/src/lib/api.js
Leads page - Lead cards are clickable and open detail modal
Lead modal - Shows property address (123 ABC Street, Philadelphia, PA 19000)
Lead modal - Shows issue description and recent messages count
Lead modal - Create Job button opens job creation dialog
Lead modal - Edit Lead button opens edit dialog
Lead modal - Status update buttons present (NEW, CONTACTED, QUALIFIED, NO RESPONSE, LOST)
Jobs page - Jobs table structure working with job rows
Jobs page - Found 2 job rows in table
Dispatch Board - Stats header shows '0 Total Jobs', '0 Assigned', '0 Unassigned' counts
Dispatch Board - 'Unassigned Jobs' column has proper label
Dispatch Board - Technician column shows 'Mike Wilson' with job count
Dispatch Board - Clean layout with date navigation
Dashboard - Found 4 metric cards that are clickable
Dashboard - Navigation and layout working
Settings page - NO Vapi integration section found (as required)
Settings page - NO Twilio phone number field found (as required)
Settings page - Company Information section present
Settings page - Messaging Style section present
Settings page - Scheduling section present
Settings page - Team & Notifications section present
Authentication - Login working with owner@radiancehvac.com credentials

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (most UI enhancements working, minor session and calendar issues)
success_percentage.integration: 80% (some navigation timeouts due to session management)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management to prevent frequent logouts. Investigate calendar page monthly view loading issue. Consider implementing session persistence or extending session timeout.
